name: Clothes
description: Clothes don't offer much protection, but they will keep you warm

name: Clothes of Viron
description: Clothes donned by the legendary hero Viron

name: Leather Armor
description: Simple armor fashioned from tanned leather strips

name: Training Suit
description: Lightweight armor that affords ease of mobility

name: Chain Mail
description: Interwoven chain links provide a compromise between weight and protection

name: Cloak of Evasion
description: Elfin cloak which allows the wearer to dodge attacks more easily

name: Fighting Suit
description: These clothes are known to increase the wearer's natural strength and agility

name: Sacred Robe
description: Holy robes which provide special protection against fire

name: Half Plate Armor
description: Strong metal plates will protect from a variety of attacks

name: Angel's Robe
description: Robes with celestial protection against instant death spells

name: Full Plate Armor
description: A full suit of armor which offers complete protection

name: Magic Armor
description: Enchanted magical suit which heals an adventurer as they travel
